answers.answer: I would get that checked especially if you had it before, rather be safe than sorry.

question: Anybody else's feet look like paddles?!No really tho, I'm having "pitted edema" where an indenting occurs after being pushed, it's gross. I had this with my last pregnancy and found out I had preeclampsia, I have no other symptoms of it besides the bad swelling.  I'm almost 30 weeks bt should I be concerned or am I just being paranoid? Anyone else having this problem??
title: Holy Swelling!
